description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Physics puzzle/platformer hybrid.  National Games Winner at Microsoft U.S. Imagine Cup. Features 100 stages and a world-class soundtrack by composer Waterflame (known for Castle Crashers).  The princess has been kidnapped by the evil Doc Broc and his team of vile vegetables.  Demolish structures, solve puzzles, and rush past obstacles on your way to save the princess.
description.short: Physics puzzle/platformer hybrid.  National Games Winner at Microsoft U.S. Imagine Cup. Features 100 stages and a world-class soundtrack by composer Waterflame (known for Castle Crashers).  The princess has been kidnapped by the evil Doc Broc and his team of vile vegetables.  Demolish structures, solve puzzles, and rush past obstacles on your way to save the princess.
